docs.text: Kung Fu Panda | Today is a Gift | Mandarin Chinese | 功夫熊猫 | 今天是天赐的礼物 | 普通话 Part 1 - Learn 36 words in HSK 1 Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-06-11 21:52:10 Shadow Practice Kung Fu Panda Pronouncing Chinese Pinyin English 不 bù no 吃 chī eat 大 dà big 的 de 东西 dōng xi thing 都 dōu all 个 gè a, an 好 hǎo good 回 huí return 家 jiā home 今天 jīn tiān today 看 kàn look 来 lái come 了 le 里 lǐ inside 没 méi no 明天 míng tiān tomorrow 那 (那儿) nà (nà ér) there, that 呢 ne 能 néng can, be able to 你 nǐ you 上 shàng up 什么 shén me what, why 是 shì be (am, is, are) 他 tā he, him 太 tài too 他们 tā men they 我 wǒ I, me 五 wǔ five 些 xiē some 有 yǒu have 在 zài in, at 怎么 zěn me how 这 (这儿) zhè (zhè ér) here, this 做 zuò do 昨天 zuó tiān yesterday Meaning 1 kàn lái nǐ yǐ jīng fā xiàn le zhè kē tiān zhì shén míng shèng táo shù 看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing1"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom. 2 jiù shì zhè kē shù ? bú hǎo yì sī wǒ hái yǐ wéi shì píng cháng de táo shù 就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing2"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Is that what this is? Sorry. I thought it was just a regular peach tree. 3 zhè wǒ lǐ jiě nǐ xīn qíng fán zào suǒ yǐ nǐ jiù chī 这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing3"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I understand. You eat when you are upset. 4 xīn fán ？wǒ méi xīn fán nǐ zěn me jiào dé wǒ xīn fán ？ 心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing4"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Upset? I’m not upset. What makes you think I’m upset. 5 nǐ dào dǐ xīn lǐ zài fán xiē shí me ？ 你到底心里在烦些什么？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing5"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你到底心里在烦些什么？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } So why are you so upset? 6 āi wǒ jīn tiān de biǎo xiàn yǒu kě néng shì lì shǐ shàng zuì làn gōng fū shǐ shàng zuì làn 哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing6"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I probably sucked more today than anyone in the history of kung fu. 7 zuì làn shǐ shàng zuì làn 最烂史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing7"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "最烂史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } In the history of China. In the history of sucking! 8 yǒu kě néng 有可能 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing8"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有可能") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Probably. 9 hái yǒu nà wǔ gè nǐ zhēn gāi kàn kàn tā men nà yàng tā men hèn sǐ wǒ le 还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing9"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } And the Five! Man, you should’ve seen them! They totally hate me. 10 hèn sǐ le 恨死了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing10"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "恨死了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Totally. 11 shī fù zěn me cái néng bǎ wǒ xùn liàn chéng shén lóng dà xiá ne 师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing11"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } How is Shifu ever going to turn me into the Dragon Warrior? 12 wǒ bú shì nà wǔ gè 我不是那五个 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing12"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我不是那五个") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I mean, I’m not like the Five. 13 wǒ méi yǒu lì zhǎo méi yǒu chì bǎng 我没有利爪 没有翅膀 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing13"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我没有利爪 没有翅膀") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I’ve got no claws, no wings, no venom. 14 méi yǒu dú yè lián táng láng dōu yǒu nà yàng de dōng xī 没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing14"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Even Mantis has those… thingies. 15 āi wǒ hái shì fàng qì ba huí jiā zuò wǒ de miàn tiáo 哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing15"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Maybe I should just quit and go back to making noodles. 16 fàng qì ? bú fàng qì ? 放弃? 不放弃? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing16"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "放弃? 不放弃?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Quit, don’t quit. 17 zuò miàn tiáo ? bú zuò miàn tiáo ? 做面条? 不做面条? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing17"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "做面条? 不做面条?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Noodles, don’t noodles. 18 nǐ huàn dé huàn shī tài zài yì cóng qián yòu tài dān xīn jiāng lái 你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing18"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } You are too concerned with what was and what will be. 19 yǒu jù huà shuō dé hǎo 有句话说得好 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing19"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有句话说得好") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } There’s a saying: 20 zuó tiān shì duàn lì shǐ 昨天是段历史 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing20"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "昨天是段历史") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Yesterday is history, 21 míng tiān shì gè mí tuán 明天是个谜团 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing21"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "明天是个谜团") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } tomorrow is a mystery, 22 ér jīn tiān shì tiān cì de lǐ wù 而今天是天赐的礼物 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing22"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "而今天是天赐的礼物") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } but today is a gift. 23 xiàng zhēn xī lǐ wù nà yàng zhēn xī jīn tiān 像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing23"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } That is why it is called the present. Shadowing Typing Type in the above input box. It will turn green if correct. Choose a Chinese input method you like. I’m using Sogou Pinyin ( Wiki , official link ). References Video: https://youtu.be/UPWgNCyUF9U HSK 1 Word list
